casebody.data:
176 A.3d 226 CITIMORTGAGE, INC., PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. THOMAS AVELLINO, DEFENDANT-PETITIONER.

C-392 September Term 2017

079401 December 8, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005058-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
